data.meta_description: Explore Cambridge High School Badi Chowdi and find out the latest admission updates, school details, reviews, admission process and send admission enquiry.
data.text:
Cambridge High School is one of the most leading and most popular schools of Telangana which is located in Sultan Bazar. It has affiliation from the state board of Hydrabad and is a co-educational school which allow both boys and girls to get admitted in the school without any basis of discrimination. The main medium of language in this school is Telegu and all the students must speak and learn Telegu as it is the main medium of the school. The school offers classes from kindergarten to 12th and caters quality and comprehensive knowledge and education. It was started to provide self-sufficiency, knowledge, motivation, dedication, inspiration, loyalty, honesty, love and respect to all the students. This school wants its learners to become excellent human beings in life and it wants from its students to tackle every life hurdle with positivity and calmness. It teaches its students to be humble, kind, warm, decent, polite, loyal and honest. The primary aim of the school is to teach love for the country and to become an independent and great citizen of the nation.

The school's infrastructure is amazing and enthusiastic. It is equipped with certain facilities which require daily basis needs and requirements of the students. Some of the facilities included in the school areas listed below:
